News.Title: Ashish Kacholia Invests ₹14.3 Cr in TechEra Engineering
News.Summary: Prominent investor Ashish Kacholia acquired a 4.8% stake in TechEra Engineering for ₹14.3 crore. The aerospace and defense company reported 38% revenue growth and turned profitable in recent quarters.

News.Title: Techera Engineering Reports H1 Net Profit of 14M Rupees, Reversing Previous Year Loss
News.Summary: Techera Engineering posted a net profit of 14 million rupees in the first half, compared to a loss of 12 million rupees in the same period of the previous year. This represents a turnaround from losses to profitability for the company.

News.Title: Tech Era Secures ₹6 Crore Order, Market Cap at ₹430 Crores
News.Summary: Tech Era has secured a new order worth ₹6 crores. The company's market capitalization currently stands at ₹430 crores.

News.Title: TechEra Engineering Participates in HAL's New Defense Production Facility Opening in Nashik
News.Summary: TechEra Engineering (India) participated in the opening of HAL's new production facility in Nashik for LCA MK1A and HTT-40 aircraft. The company highlighted its position as a key partner in India's local defense manufacturing sector during the facility inauguration.

News.Title: Ashish Kacholia Acquires Shares in TechEra Engineering Through Open Market Purchase
News.Summary: Ashish Kacholia, associated with Bengal Finance & Investment, has acquired shares in TechEra Engineering through open market transactions. The article mentions two different share quantities - 1.12 lakh shares and 200,000 shares - though the exact number is unclear from the provided information.

News.Title: TechEra Engineering Sees Share Purchases by Bengal Finance and Surya Vanshi Commotrade
News.Summary: TechEra Engineering experienced notable share acquisitions through open market transactions. Bengal Finance & Investment Pvt Ltd purchased 4.22 lakh shares, while Surya Vanshi Commotrade, associated with Ashish Kacholia, acquired 4.49 lakh shares. Both transactions were conducted through open market purchases.
